definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc

sentences.english: And in this case a man got hooked on a bamboo sleeping mat.
sentences.chinese: 而这里，这个男人觉得一个竹凉席是很不同的。

sentences.english: The bed mat has traded, pad on a bed of a thin quilt.
sentences.chinese: 床上的凉席早已换走，垫上一床薄薄的被子了。

sentences.english: Most people in the summer tend to add a summer sleeping mat on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 一般人在夏季往往在枕头上加一块凉席。

sentences.english: Bacteria are hard to breed on foot mat and mat.
sentences.chinese: 脚垫及凉席不易滋生细菌。

sentences.english: Now they take turns to sleep on the waterbed using a thin mat.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他们轮流睡在这张铺着薄凉席的水床上。

definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
